Graphic Designer/Web Developer


  We are growing e-learning and web development company located in Markham, Ontario (Toronto region) and are currently seeking a Graphic Arts Designer/Web developer. This person needs to demonstrate an excitement about being the key creative contributor to a variety of synchronous projects. Thus making tea&quok and communication a critical requirement. Candidates should have a broad creative flair with a strong web-based graphics background. Presentation of professional examples, including an online portfolio, will be required for consideration.

Qualifications:

- 2+ years of professional experience
- A college degree or professional equivalent
- Artistic aptitude. Ability to generate concepts that attract and engage.
- Knows the principles of project planning, layout, and storyboarding with the flexibility required to achieve the highest quality while maintaining deadlines and budget. and placement of copy and logos.
- Pays attention to detail. Approaches work in a meticulous and thorough manner. Is flexible and can adjust to shifting priorities.

Required Skills:

Strong verbal and written communication skills and willingness to give and take direction
Photoshop, Illustrator, Dreamweaver,
Flash 5.0 and 6.0 action script, Swish,
Strong understanding of communication between Flash, HTML and back-end databases
Understanding browser / Internet server settings and implications of a variety of bandwidth environments.

Preferred Skills:

Experience with Javascript and HTML
Experience with XML, ASP, SQL, PHP
Experience in audio editing with Cool Edit or similar
Familiarity with Flash animation
Experience with streaming media
Experience with 3D software
Experience in instructional design.

- Additional duties include the design and development of logos, other branding materials as needed, and generating web site content.

A full benefits program will be part of the compensation package.

Please forward a resume, salary requirements, cover letter and links to any online examples to chevronsolutions@rogers.com .
